title: Enter your new mobile phone number
error-title: Error: Enter your new mobile phone number
heading: Enter your new mobile phone number
p-1: We will send a security code to this number.
p-2: Whenever you sign in to this service we will send you a new security code.
label: Mobile phone number
hint: For international numbers include the country code

error.empty: Mobile phone number is required to continue with account recovery
